snippet.title: Sonic at the Olympic Games – Tokyo 2020™
snippet.description:
Get Sonic at the Olympic Games – Tokyo 2020™ now from:
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sega.tokyo
App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1484836043
Amazon Appstore: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B084JMRN4H

For more information, visit the official website for details.
https://www.olympicvideogames.com/sonic/en/

For the latest about the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020 please see www.tokyo2020.org
